bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Network Reference Model and Functional Description of IEEE 802 Access Network
IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Network Reference Model and Functional Description of IEEE 802 Access Network

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: An access network (which connects terminals to their access routers) utilizing technologies based on the family of IEEE 802Â® standards is specified in this recommended practice. An access network reference model (NRM) that includes entities and reference points along with behavioral and functional descriptions of communications among those entities is provided in this recommended practice.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
